recommended_treatment: Systemic therapy with (or without) EBRT and vaginal brachytherapy
description: High-grade serous adenocarcinoma of the uterus involving >50% myometrial invasion, cervix, adnexa, and peritoneum consistent with AJCC pathologic stage pT3a/Nx.
patient_notes: Your report shows a high-grade uterine cancer that has spread into the muscle of your uterus and to nearby tissues. Because it is advanced, you will need chemotherapy and possibly radiation treatments to the pelvis and vaginal area. This approach aims to remove any remaining cancer cells after surgery. Your care team will guide you through each step of the treatment.

verification.assessment: The extracted staging overlooked FIGO guidelines: uterine serous carcinoma with adnexal and peritoneal involvement corresponds to Stage IIIA, not unspecified.

figo_stage.issues: FIGO stage was left unspecified but should be IIIA based on direct extension to adnexa and peritoneum

change_explanations.figo_stage: Changed from 'Not specified' to 'Stage IIIA'. Reason: FIGO stage was left unspecified but should be IIIA based on direct extension to adnexa and peritoneum
